name: Speedo
description: A Userbot Based On Pyrogram And Telethon. Note if You want to use telethon then fill required fill if only pyrogram then fill pyrogram required feilds if both fill all feilds

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

ALIVE_IMG.description: Add telegraph link for alive pic or video

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: Add telegraph link for PMPERMIT pic or video

MONGO_DB.description: Create A Database In Mongodb And Get URL. Make Sure To Enter Correct URL!

BOT_UB_TOKEN.description: Add Bot token if you will be using telethon else type skip.

BOT_UB_USERNAME.description: Add Bot Username if you will be using telethon else type skip.

PM_LOG_ID.description: A Group ID Where You Want To Log Important Logs. type skip if you are not using telethon else fill

LOAD_UNOFFICIAL_PLUGINS.description: Do You Wish To Load X-Tra Plugins?

LOGGER_ID.description: A Group ID Where You Want To Log Important Logs. type skip if you are not using telethon else fill

LOG_GRP.description: A Group ID Where You Want To Log Important Logs.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku App Name That You Filled Above.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Your Upstream URL HERE. If You're Beginner, Don't Change This.

TELETHON_SESSION.description: Telethon session If dont want add skip

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot Token Obtained From @BotFather. This is Not Important

STRINGSESSION.description: String Session, Run string_gen.py to get String Session.
